text: @realDonaldTrump The only thing that is fake is you! I blame you for this mess with COVID19 because u fired the Pandemic Team and the only reason u did it was because they were Obama’s people. If you would not have done that, we would’ve been more prepared and be ready for this sh*t! Ur a joke!
